text: Melum, "allah irakki vaitta i(vvetat)taip pinparrunkal" enru avarkalitam kurappattal, avarkal"appatiyalla! Enkalutaiya mutataiyarkal enta valiyil (natakkak) kantomo, anta valiyaiye nankalum pinparrukirom" enru kurukirarkal;. Enna! Avarkalutaiya mutataiyarkal, etaiyum vilankatavarkalakavum, nervaliperatavarkalakavum iruntal kutava
